full: Say/, the photographer said as the camera flashed! / and I had gone to / to get our photos taken today. The first photo we really wanted was a picture of us dressed as / pretending to be a /. Hi my name is /, but my friends call me / /. My favorite color is the color of / and my favorite thing to do is /. My parents were a / and /, which is why we lived in /. You probably know me from my TV commercial for /. I'm the one who says, '/' at the very end!
